input_text:
S: 45-year-old male with chest tightness for 2 days.
O: BP 140/90, HR 88.
A: Suspected GERD.
P: Start omeprazole 20mg daily.
Visit Date: March 3, 2024

S: Patient complains of headache and dizziness since yesterday.
O: Afebrile, neuro exam normal.
A: Tension headache.
P: Recommend rest and hydration.
Visit Date: 2024-01-15

S: 32-year-old female with dysuria and urinary frequency.
O: UA positive for leukocytes.
A: Urinary tract infection.
P: Prescribe nitrofurantoin 100mg BID for 5 days.

S: 67-year-old male presents for routine follow-up. No new complaints.
O: BP 130/80.
A: Hypertension, stable.
P: Continue lisinopril.
Visit Date: Feb 10 2024

S: 24-year-old reports sore throat for 1 day.
O: Mild pharyngeal erythema.
P: Gargle with warm salt water.
Visit Date: 03/22/24

S: 58-year-old female with shortness of breath on exertion.
O: O2 sat 94%.
A: COPD exacerbation.
P: Albuterol inhaler PRN, prednisone 40mg daily x5 days.
Visit Date: April 1, 2024

S: 40-year-old male complains of lower back pain after lifting boxes.
O: Decreased ROM lumbar spine.
A: Lumbar strain.
P: Ibuprofen as needed.

S: 29-year-old female with nausea and vomiting since morning.
O: Abdomen soft, non-tender.
A: Viral gastroenteritis.
P: Oral hydration advised.
Visit Date: 2024-02-02

S: 71-year-old male presents with memory loss over past year.
O: MMSE 23/30.
A: Mild cognitive impairment.
P: Start donepezil 5mg nightly.
Visit Date: January 8, 2024

S: Patient here for annual physical.
O: Normal exam.
A: No acute issues.
P: Routine labs ordered.
Visit Date: 2024-05-12

S: 36-year-old with rash on left arm for one week.
O: Erythematous maculopapular rash.
A: Contact dermatitis.
P: Prescribe triamcinolone cream.

S: 52-year-old male reports fatigue and weight gain.
O: TSH elevated.
A: Hypothyroidism.
P: Start levothyroxine 50mcg daily.
Visit Date: 6/5/24

S: 18-year-old female with knee pain after soccer injury.
O: Swelling and tenderness.
A: Knee sprain.
P: Rest, ice, compression, elevation.

S: 60-year-old complains of frequent urination.
O: Glucose elevated.
P: Discussed management of diabetes mellitus.
Visit Date: 2024-04-18

S: Elderly patient presents with falls.
O: Unsteady gait.
A: Balance impairment.
P: Physical therapy referral.
Visit Date: March 30, 2024
